Package com.glamdring.greenZenith.externals.database

package com.glamdring.greenZenith.externals.database
Provides different tools designed to access and control the usage of a Database, it's data, queries adn actions.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.glamdring.greenZenith.externals
    Provides different additional tools outside of the main logic of the proyect that help manage information and data.
    com.glamdring.greenZenith.externals.database.constants
    Provides constant values in enumeration classes and different items that help with the handling of a database.
    com.glamdring.greenZenith.externals.apis
    Contains external APIs for information and data management.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    GZDBConnector
    Provides methods for connecting to a MySQL database, performing various CRUD operations, and retrieving table information.
    GZDBExecutor
    Creates, prepares, fills and executes SQL Statements depending on the given input.
    GZDBSuperManager
    Establishes a connection with the database and obtains the different field names and data types of a specific table.
